snippet.title: Realm of Ink - Official Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
👇Realm of Ink Early Access Out Now on Steam!
store.steampowered.com/app/2597080/Realm_of_Ink/

Realm of Ink is a fast-paced isometric Ink-style action Rogue-lite game, set in an Eastern fantasy world. While pursuing the Fox Demon, the swordswoman Red, unexpectedly finds that her life is dictated by the 'destiny' within the world of the book. Only by breaking free can she unveil the truth of her existence and challenge the constraints of fate.

In the Early Access, you'll get to enjoy:

📖Complete 4-act levels and battle against 8 bosses, and finally face the ultimate boss - the Book's Spirit.
⚔️Play as the playable character, Red the Swordswoman, who has 9 distinct forms and weapons.
💎Experience the full gameplay of 22 Ink Gem skills across 4 tiers.
🐈Engage with the full gameplay of 15 Ink Pets across 4 tiers and over 40 forms.
⚙️Over 130 Perks that offer diverse building possibilities.
🗺️Explore the first layer of world-building and about 50% of the storyline.

We look forward to your joining this exciting journey and embarking in the Realm of Ink!


#realmofink  #indiegame  #roguelike

-------------------------------------------------------------

Check out and subscribe our social media channels for more exclusives contents and insight of the game:
X: X.com/realmofink
Facebook: www.facebook.com/RealmofInk
Discord: discord.gg/X63T277eVn
Official website: realmofink.com
